summary: THE CAR ACCELERATES EVEN WHEN NOT PUSHING THE PEDAL ITS THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR WAS DIAGNOSED AND GIVEN CODE BUT HONDA WILL NOT REPAIR THIS VERY DANGEROUS SAFETY RECALL ON MY CAR EVEN THOUGH IT IS HAVING THE SAME SYMPTOMS FROM CAMPAIGN 19E068.
